name: Tomato Barley Soup
author: Nancy Olsen
summary: I LOVE soup! This is one of my favorites. It has lots of vegetables and is full of flavor. I usually throw in some chopped cabbage. To make this a vegetarian recipe, use vegetable broth for the chicken broth.
ingredients: 1 (14.5 ounce) can peeled and diced tomatoes with juice
directions: In a large saucepan over medium heat, combine the onions, celery, carrots, garlic and oil and saute for 5 to 10 minutes, or until all vegetables are almost tender
Then add the water, fresh tomatoes, canned tomatoes, chicken broth, barley and ground black pepper
Stir thoroughly and bring to a boil
Reduce heat to low and simmer for 35 to 40 minutes, or until barley is tender
